Posts.Content: Dec 22, 2016 10:44PM rnbsns58 wrote: I am 3 weeks post op. Had bilateral mastectomies and a right axillary node dissection. I too got very little information about doing anything post op. i am scheduled to see a Physical therapist who is trained in lymphedema Jan. 4th. In the mean time I'm supposed to return to work the 1st of Jan. My arm is stiff- incisions are ok but the skin around is so sensitive everything that touches me feels like sandpaper.I feel like my skin is so tight I can hardly stand it. Just want to know if this is norma.l
Posts.Title: Mastectomy scar tissue and tightness - can it be prevented? Icantri quaydvt
